ClowCardTheArrow.NAME: Arrow
ClowCardTheArrow.DESCRIPTION: [ Firey ] NL Discard any cards, deal !D! damage to random enemy the number of discarded cards +X times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [ Firey ] NL Discard any cards, deal !D! damage the number of discarded cards plus +X times.

ClowCardTheBig.NAME: Big
ClowCardTheBig.DESCRIPTION: [ Firey ] NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose 1 Dexterity.

ClowCardTheBubbles.NAME: Bubbles
ClowCardTheBubbles.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] NL Deal !D! damage. NL Remove a random buff.
ClowCardTheBubbles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] NL Deal !D! damage. NL Remove a random buff. NL Gain !M! Magick-Charge when successful.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] NL Deal !D! damage. NL remove all buffs.
[ Watery ] NL Deal !D! damage. NL remove all buffs. NL Gain !M! Magick-Charge when successful.

ClowCardTheChange.NAME: Change
ClowCardTheChange.DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ] NL Discard up to 1 card, draw discarded cards amount plus !M! cards.

ClowCardTheCloud.NAME: Cloud
ClowCardTheCloud.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] NL Gain !M! Block for every Watery-Element-State in your hand.

ClowCardTheCreate.NAME: Create
ClowCardTheCreate.DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ][ Windy ] Removable. Cost-Decreasing. Entity-Limited. NL Add a random relic to the battle reward.

ClowCardTheDark.NAME: Dark
ClowCardTheDark.DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ][ Watery ] NL At the end of the turn, exhaust up to 1 card. If you exhaust more then 0, gain 1 energy next turn.

ClowCardTheDream.NAME: Dream
ClowCardTheDream.DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] Exhaust. NL Add !M! random Clow Card to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

ClowCardTheEarthy.NAME: Earthy
ClowCardTheEarthy.DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ] NL Add !M! Lei-Di to your hand. Enter the Earthy-Element-State.

ClowCardTheErase.NAME: Erase
ClowCardTheErase.DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] NL Kill Minion or normal monster with less than 33% health. Otherwise, deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] NL Kill a non-boss, non-minion target with less than 66% health. Otherwise, deal !D! damage.

ClowCardTheFight.NAME: Fight
ClowCardTheFight.DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ] Exhaust. Continuously. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Magick-Charge. NL Gain !M! Temporary-Strength.

ClowCardTheFirey.NAME: Firey
ClowCardTheFirey.DESCRIPTION: [ Firey ] NL Add !M! Huo-Shen to your hand. NL Enter Firey-Element-State.

ClowCardTheFloat.NAME: Float
ClowCardTheFloat.DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] NL Gain !M! Block for every card you draw.
ClowCardTheFloat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] Innate. Gain !M! Block for every card you draw.

ClowCardTheFly.NAME: Fly
ClowCardTheFly.DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] NL Draw !M! cards. Lose 3 Magick-Charge.

ClowCardTheFreeze.NAME: Freeze
ClowCardTheFreeze.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

ClowCardTheGlow.NAME: Glow
ClowCardTheGlow.DESCRIPTION: [ Firey ] NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 2 Magick-Charge.

ClowCardTheIllusion.NAME: Illusion
ClowCardTheIllusion.DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] NL Gain !B! Block. NL For every 3 cards in the exhaust pile, gain extra !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] NL Gain !B! Block. NL For every 2 cards in the exhaust pile, gain extra !M! Block.

ClowCardTheJump.NAME: Jump
ClowCardTheJump.DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] Exhaust. NL Gain !B! point block. NL Randomly remove a debuff.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] Exhaust. NL Gain !B! point block. NL Remove all debuffs.

ClowCardTheLibra.NAME: Libra
ClowCardTheLibra.DESCRIPTION: [ Firey ] NL Gain !B! Block, or double if you have no Block with losing !M! Magick-Charge.

ClowCardTheLight.NAME: Light
ClowCardTheLight.DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ][ Firey ] NL Increase your hand limit by 2. NL When Void is drawn, energy is no longer deducted.
ClowCardTheLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ][ Firey ] NL Increase your hand limit by 2. NL When Void is drawn, energy is no longer deducted. NL Void is playable and draws 1 card.

ClowCardTheLittle.NAME: Little
ClowCardTheLittle.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Lose 1 Strength.

ClowCardTheLock.NAME: Lock
ClowCardTheLock.DESCRIPTION: [ Firey ] Exhaust. NL Exhaust up to !M! cards. Gain 1 Magick-Charge for each exhausted card. Unreal.

ClowCardTheLoop.NAME: Loop
ClowCardTheLoop.DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ] NL At the start of turn, draw !M! card, discard !M! card.

ClowCardTheMirror.NAME: Mirror
ClowCardTheMirror.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] Ethereal. Exhaust. NL Copy 1 Clow Card or Sakura-Card in your hand.
ClowCardTheMirror.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] Exhaust. NL Copy 1 Clow Card or Sakura-Card in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add extra 1 copy of target card to your hand.

ClowCardTheMist.NAME: Mist
ClowCardTheMist.DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ] NL Apply !M! Poison to all enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Remove all Defence-Buffs from all enemies.

ClowCardTheMove.NAME: Move
ClowCardTheMove.DESCRIPTION: [ Firey ] NL Add !M! Empty-Spell into hand.

ClowCardThePower.NAME: Power
ClowCardThePower.DESCRIPTION: [ Firey ] NL Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! Strength.

ClowCardTheRain.NAME: Rain
ClowCardTheRain.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] Exhaust. NL The cost of cards in hand is reduced by 1 this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] The cost of cards in hand is reduced by 1 this turn.

ClowCardTheReturn.NAME: Return
ClowCardTheReturn.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] NL Record the current state and return to this state after !M! rounds. NL Add 2 Void into the discard pile.
ClowCardTheReturn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] Retain. NL Record the current state and return this state after !M! rounds. NL Add 2 Void into the discard pile.

ClowCardTheSand.NAME: Sand
ClowCardTheSand.DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ] NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison.

ClowCardTheShadow.NAME: Shadow
ClowCardTheShadow.DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ] NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Blur.

ClowCardTheShield.NAME: Shield
ClowCardTheShield.DESCRIPTION: [ Firey ] NL Lone-Ranger. NL Gain !B! Block.

ClowCardTheShot.NAME: Shot
ClowCardTheShot.DESCRIPTION: [ Firey ] NL Apply 2 times. Each deal !D! damage and apply !M! Poison.

ClowCardTheSilent.NAME: Silent
ClowCardTheSilent.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] NL Gain 1 Buffer. You cannot play Attacks next turn.

ClowCardTheSleep.NAME: Sleep
ClowCardTheSleep.DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] Exhaust. NL Sleep non-boss targets for !M! turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] Exhaust. NL Sleep all non-boss enemy for !M! turn.

ClowCardTheSnow.NAME: Snow
ClowCardTheSnow.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] NL Each Watery-Element-Card played in this battle deals !D! damage to a random enemy.

ClowCardTheSong.NAME: Song
ClowCardTheSong.DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] NL Exhaust up to X+1 cards. For each exhausted card, deal !D! damage to all enemies.

ClowCardTheStorm.NAME: Storm
ClowCardTheStorm.DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] NL Deal !D! damage. Add 1 Void into the discard pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Add 1 Void into the discard pile.

ClowCardTheSword.NAME: Sword
ClowCardTheSword.DESCRIPTION: [ Firey ] NL Lone-Ranger. NL Deal !D! damage.

ClowCardTheThrough.NAME: Through
ClowCardTheThrough.DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ] NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Apply Poison damage 1 time. NL Add 1 Void into the discard pile.
ClowCardTheThrough.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ] NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Deepen the Poison by !M!. Apply Poison damage 1 time. NL Add 1 Void into the discard pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: % damage to the target's max health.

ClowCardTheThunder.NAME: Thunder
ClowCardTheThunder.DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ] Retain. Charging-Limited. NL Deal !D! damage to random enemy !M! times. NL Add 1 Void into the discard pile.

ClowCardTheTime.NAME: Time
ClowCardTheTime.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] Exhaust. NL Interrupt all enemy operations. NL Add 2 Void into the discard pile.
ClowCardTheTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] Exhaust. NL Interrupt all enemy operations. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Add 2 Void into the discard pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] Exhaust. NL Interrupt all enemy operations.
[ Watery ] Exhaust. NL Interrupt all enemy operations. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

ClowCardTheTwin.NAME: Twin
ClowCardTheTwin.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ][ Firey ] NL The first Clow-Card you play each turn is played twice.
ClowCardTheTwin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ][ Firey ] Retain. NL The first Clow-Card you play each turn is played twice.

ClowCardTheVoice.NAME: Voice
ClowCardTheVoice.DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] Ethereal. Invisible. NL Add a copy to the discard pile. NL Protect !B!. NL Echo !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] Ethereal. Invisible. NL Add a copy to the discard pile. NL Protect !B!. NL Echo !M!.

ClowCardTheWatery.NAME: Watery
ClowCardTheWatery.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] NL Add !M! Shui-Long to your hand. NL Enter Watery-Element-State.

ClowCardTheWave.NAME: Wave
ClowCardTheWave.DESCRIPTION: [ Watery ] NL Gain !M! Block when using Attack card.

ClowCardTheWindy.NAME: Windy
ClowCardTheWindy.DESCRIPTION: [ Windy ] NL Add !M! Feng-Hua to your hand. NL Enter Windy-Element-State.

ClowCardTheWood.NAME: Wood
ClowCardTheWood.DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ] NL Target loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Increase Poison by 50%.
ClowCardTheWood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [ Earthy ] NL Target loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Move all the Poison to the target. Increase Poison by 50%.

SpellCardRelease.NAME: Release
SpellCardRelease.DESCRIPTION: [ Spell ] NL Release 1 Clow-Card in your hand. Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies.

SpellCardSeal.NAME: Seal
SpellCardSeal.DESCRIPTION: [ Spell ] NL Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, The Sealed-Wand gains extra !M! charge.

SpellCardTurn.NAME: Turn
SpellCardTurn.DESCRIPTION: [ Spell ] Retain. NL Convert 1 Clow-Card to Sakura-Card.

SpellCardEmptySpell.NAME: Empty Spell
SpellCardEmptySpell.DESCRIPTION: [ Spell ] Ethereal. Exhaust. NL Choose one of the four spells of Huo-Shen, Lei-Di, Feng-Hua and Shui-Long to join the hand.

SpellCardHuoShen.NAME: Huo Shen
SpellCardHuoShen.DESCRIPTION: [ Spell ][ Firey ] Ethereal. Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage.

SpellCardLeiDi.NAME: Lei Di

SpellCardFengHua.NAME: Feng Hua
SpellCardFengHua.DESCRIPTION: [ Spell ][ Windy ] Ethereal. Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.

SpellCardShuiLong.NAME: Shui Long
SpellCardShuiLong.DESCRIPTION: [ Spell ][ Watery ] Ethereal. Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

SakuraCardTheArrow.NAME: Arrow
SakuraCardTheArrow.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Firey ] NL Discard all cards in the draw pile. For each discarded Clow-Card or Sakura-Card with a different name, deal !D! damage to a random target.

SakuraCardTheBig.NAME: Big
SakuraCardTheBig.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Firey ] NL Attacks deal 33% more damage.

SakuraCardTheBubbles.NAME: Bubbles
SakuraCardTheBubbles.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Watery ] Retain. Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Remove all buffs on target.

SakuraCardTheChange.NAME: Change
SakuraCardTheChange.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ] NL Discard your hand. Draw !M! cards.

SakuraCardTheCloud.NAME: Cloud
SakuraCardTheCloud.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Watery ] NL Gain !B! Block. For every 3 Watery-Element-State in the master deck, gain Block extra 1 time .

SakuraCardTheCreate.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ][ Windy ] Removable. NL Gain a random relic and a character exclusive relic as battle reward.

SakuraCardTheDark.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Windy ][ Watery ] NL At the end of the turn, Exhaust your hand and add the same number of upgraded random Clow-Cards to the discard pile.

SakuraCardTheDash.NAME: Dash
SakuraCardTheDash.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Windy ] Exhaust. NL Draw until your hand is full.

SakuraCardTheDream.NAME: Dream
SakuraCardTheDream.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Windy ] Exhaust. NL Convert the Clow-Cards in your hand into Sakura-Cards as much as possible in this turn.

SakuraCardTheEarthy.NAME: Earthy
SakuraCardTheEarthy.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ] NL Enter the Earthy-Element-State permanently.

SakuraCardTheFight.NAME: Fight
SakuraCardTheFight.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ] NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength.

SakuraCardTheFirey.NAME: Firey
SakuraCardTheFirey.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Firey ] NL Enter the Firey-Element-State permanently.

SakuraCardTheFloat.NAME: Float
SakuraCardTheFloat.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Windy ] NL At the start of turn, gain !M! Dexterity.

SakuraCardTheFlower.NAME: Flower
SakuraCardTheFlower.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ] Exhaust. NL Gain !M! energy.

SakuraCardTheFly.NAME: Fly
SakuraCardTheFly.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Windy ] NL At the start of turn, draw !M! cards.

SakuraCardTheFreeze.NAME: Freeze

SakuraCardTheGlow.NAME: Glow
SakuraCardTheGlow.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Firey ] NL At the start of turn, gain !M! Magick-Charge.

SakuraCardTheIllusion.NAME: Illusion

SakuraCardTheJump.NAME: Jump
SakuraCardTheJump.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Windy ] NL At the start of turn, remove !M! random debuff.

SakuraCardTheLibra.NAME: Libra
SakuraCardTheLibra.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Firey ] NL Remove all Magick-Charge, gain !B! Block for each Magick-Charge removed.

SakuraCardTheLight.NAME: Light
SakuraCardTheLight.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ][ Firey ] NL Exhaust all Status and Curses. Each heal 1 health and draw 1 card.

SakuraCardTheLittle.NAME: Little
SakuraCardTheLittle.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Watery ] NL Receive 33% less damage from Attacks.

SakuraCardTheLock.NAME: Lock

SakuraCardTheLoop.NAME: Loop
SakuraCardTheLoop.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ] NL For each card that is actively discarded, draw one card.

SakuraCardTheLove.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ] NL Unable to be played, gain !M! energy when drawn.

SakuraCardTheMaze.NAME: Maze
SakuraCardTheMaze.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ] NL Gain !B! Block !M! times.

SakuraCardTheMirror.NAME: Mirror
SakuraCardTheMirror.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Watery ] Exhaust. NL Select 1 of all Clow Cards to join the hand.

SakuraCardTheMist.NAME: Mist
SakuraCardTheMist.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ] NL Removes all Block of all enemies. NL At the start of turn, apply !M! Poison to all enemies.

SakuraCardTheMove.NAME: Move
SakuraCardTheMove.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Firey ] NL At the start of turn, add !M! Empty-Spell to your hand.

SakuraCardTheRain.NAME: Rain

SakuraCardTheReturn.NAME: Return
SakuraCardTheReturn.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Watery ] Retain. Removable. NL Restore all health and return 75% of the charge consumed by the last convert( !M! ).

SakuraCardTheSand.NAME: Sand
SakuraCardTheSand.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ] NL Deal !D! damage, apply 1 Poison !M! times.

SakuraCardTheShadow.NAME: Shadow
SakuraCardTheShadow.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ] NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Intangible.

SakuraCardTheShield.NAME: Shield
SakuraCardTheShield.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Firey ] NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain extra Block equal to !M! % of your lost health.

SakuraCardTheShot.NAME: Shot
SakuraCardTheShot.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Firey ] NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.

SakuraCardTheSilent.NAME: Silent
SakuraCardTheSilent.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Watery ] Exhaust. NL Gain !M! Buffer.

SakuraCardTheSleep.NAME: Sleep
SakuraCardTheSleep.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Windy ] Exhaust. NL Sleep non-boss targets for !M! turn.

SakuraCardTheSnow.NAME: Snow
SakuraCardTheSnow.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Watery ] NL Each card played this turn deals !D! damage to all enemies. NL A total of !M!.

SakuraCardTheSong.NAME: Song
SakuraCardTheSong.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Windy ] NL Exhaust any number of cards. For each exhausted card, deal !D! damage to all enemies and gain !B! Block.

SakuraCardTheStorm.NAME: Storm
SakuraCardTheStorm.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Windy ] NL Deal !D! ~ !B! damage !M! times.

SakuraCardTheSweet.NAME: Sweet
SakuraCardTheSweet.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Firey ] NL At the start of the turn, heal !M! % of the lost health.

SakuraCardTheSword.NAME: Sword
SakuraCardTheSword.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Firey ] NL Deal !D! damage and extra !M! % of target's current health.

SakuraCardTheThrough.NAME: Through
SakuraCardTheThrough.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ] NL Deal !D! and 10% of the maximum health damage to all enemies.

SakuraCardTheThunder.NAME: Thunder
SakuraCardTheThunder.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Earthy ] NL Gains 2X Magick-Charge and Remove all. Deal !D! damage to random enemy for each !M! Magick-Charge.

SakuraCardTheTime.NAME: Time
SakuraCardTheTime.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Watery ] Innate. Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies and interrupt their operations.

SakuraCardTheTwin.NAME: Twin
SakuraCardTheTwin.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Firey ][ Watery ] NL Increase the cost of all cards in your hand by 1. All Clow-Cards are played twice.

SakuraCardTheVoice.NAME: Voice
SakuraCardTheVoice.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Windy ] NL At the start of turn, Add !M! The-Voice to your hand.

SakuraCardTheWatery.NAME: Watery
SakuraCardTheWatery.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Watery ] NL Enter the Watery-Element-State permanently.

SakuraCardTheWave.NAME: Wave
SakuraCardTheWave.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Watery ] Exhaust. NL Enter all the Element State

SakuraCardTheWindy.NAME: Windy
SakuraCardTheWindy.DESCRIPTION: [ Sakura-Card ][ Windy ] NL Permanent entry into the Windy-Element-States at the same time.
